data.name: FAQAnsDesc1
data.value: Contact us to start your trial course.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc1_1
data.value: Online reservation

data.name: FAQAnsDesc1_2
data.value: The content of the course is as follows:

data.name: FAQAnsDesc1_2_1
data.value: A careful consultation of your physical condition.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc1_2_2
data.value: A careful analysis of your exercise habits and lifestyle.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc1_2_3
data.value: Before Online course, trainer will check the hardware and software equipment with you in advance.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc1_2_4
data.value: Trainers will bring out your training goals and results, leading you to a personalized program and experience.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc1_2_5
data.value: Trainers are always by your side customizing your training courses.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc2_1_1
data.value: How to charge?

data.name: FAQAnsDesc2_1_2
data.value: In person one-on-one training fee is charged based on the number of courses. Price ranges from TWD$1,700 to TWD$1,900.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc2_1_3
data.value: Online one-on-one training fee is about TWD$1,200 to TWD$1,400 which is calculated based on the number of lessons.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc2_1_4
data.value: Nutrition course will be reach the best effect with a “monthly” cycle, and the price will be TWD$4,000 per month.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc2_2_1
data.value: Are there any monthly fee, membership fee or handling charge?

data.name: FAQAnsDesc2_2_2
data.value: Beyond fitness provides 1 on 1 customized training. You don’t need to pay any other monthly fee, membership fee or handling charges.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc3_1
data.value: Nutrition course is designed for those who value self-health management, need to to lose weight, improve immunity, the three-high chronic disease group, and those who want to increase muscle mass through weight training. Beyond’s nutrition course provides you with good result and services.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc3_2
data.value: Athletic Trainer (Sports protection) provides the most indispensable help to confirm the condition of your joints and muscles throughout your body. If you have sports injuries or joint and muscle-related issue, an athletic trainer can help you return to normal levels.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc3_3
data.value: Our recovery coach team provides sport massage and stretching service which can help relieve stress for people who are prone to soreness such as long-term shoulders, necks, lower back or sitting for a long time.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc4_1
data.value: Our team is second to none in the industry. Regardless of personal training, nutrition planning, recovery and injury prevention, all relevant personnel must equipped with relevant international and professional certification qualifications (which must be within the validity period), internal professional team management (performance tests every quarter). With scientific based training as the foundation with systematic records, analysis, we give every customer the most intimate and trustworthy service.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc5_1
data.value: An excellent one-on-one personal trainer will customize training programs according to your goals, life style, physical condition of the day, helping you achieve goals together.

data.name: FAQAnsDesc5_2
data.value: It is important to help you organize the rest of the non-exercise time with nutrition intake, fascia relaxation and injury prevention. We focus on your uniqueness and differentiation, and provide the most effective training!

data.name: FAQAnsDesc6_1
data.value: Of course! We provide customers who take training courses at Beyond Fitness with registration for self-training. Your trainer will schedule and customize training session (shown as P.I. Session) for you. By registration, the number of people is controlled to maintain the venue to provide you with the best training quality.

data.name: JoinUsJobSlogon
data.value: Find your team, start your own extraordinary story with BEYOND.

data.name: JoinUsCoachSlogon
data.value:
We love to challenge
IMPOSSIBLE

data.name: JoinUsCoachDesc
data.value: Founded in 2014, Beyond Fitness is devoted to developing professional one-on-one personal trainers. Beyond Fitness was established at Nanjing E. Road, by Taipei Arena and has since expanded to Xinyi (Anhe), Zhongxiao and Dongmen branches in three years. Behind all this, we are just a group of partners who want to let action and professional practice speak louder than words; and most importantly, provide service to the clients who have faith in us. We believe that education should be personalized so as training. We should customize accordingly to individuals’ need that is most suitable for "people", guiding customers to live a better life.

data.name: JoinUsTherapistSlogon
data.value: Personalized recovery solutions delivered by fitness experts

data.name: JoinUsTherapistDesc
data.value: Beyond Fitness is not only dedicated to designing customized exercise programs and providing professional guidance, but we also offer comprehensive sports recovery solutions. Our recovery coaches possess extensive expertise and experience to help you instantly restore your physical energy, prevent injuries, and develop appropriate exercise plans to ensure your body is in its optimal state. Whether you aim to shape a fit physique or improve your overall health, we are committed to providing you with the most professional fitness services and comprehensive recovery guidance.

data.name: JoinUsDietitianSlogon
data.value: Customize your nutritional goals to help you achieve success.

data.name: JoinUsDietitianDesc
data.value: At Beyond Fitness, our nutrition consultants provide comprehensive nutrition advice and dietary guidance. With their expertise and experience, they tailor nutrition plans to help you achieve your fitness and health goals. Whether you want to build muscle or lose weight, they offer the most professional advice and support. Our nutrition consultants not only provide dietary recommendations and recipe suggestions but also assess nutritional deficiencies or metabolic issues and adjust nutrition plans based on your body condition. Let our dedicated team guide you on your fitness and health journey.

data.value:
Dedicated Service
Four Levels of Care

data.name: ServiceBannerSlognDesc

data.name: AboutUsBannerSlogn
data.value:
Ignite your Passion for Sport
Discover Joy IN Beyond

data.name: AboutUsBannerSlognDesc
data.value: Experience the Joy of Movement<br class="hidden-sm-up">Uniquely Crafted for You

data.name: AboutUsBrandSlogon
data.value: Believe in the Brand

data.name: AboutUsBrandSlogonDesc
data.value: Beyond believes that fitness is more than just a casual pursuit—it's a commitment to excellence.

data.name: AboutUsBelieve
data.value: WE BELIEVE

data.name: AboutUsBelieveDesc
data.value: 「if we help you change your lifestyle and lead you to a healthier life, you will naturally find the value and quality of your life.」

data.name: AboutUsCompanyDesc1
data.value: Since 2014, Beyond has emerged from Taipei Arena and expanded to four branches including Xinyi Anhe, Zhongxiao, and Dongmen. With over 50 dedicated team members, we possess a comprehensive organizational structure, providing you with personalized training, nutrition consultation, sports massage recovery, injury prevention, corporate team health strategies, professional sports education and training, and corporate health consulting. We proudly stand as the largest center for customized sports training in Taiwan.

data.name: AboutUsCompanyDesc2
data.value: With passion and professionalism, we strive to create a unique and unparalleled tranining experience for you. No matter what your goals may be, we believe that every moment should be filled with energy and enjoyment. In addition to exciting Game Day events and team activities, we offer off-site training and opportunities to share the joy of sports with friends from rural areas. Because to us, sports is not just a serious endeavor, but a chance to create value in moments of delight and pleasure.

data.value:

FOR FREE

data.name: BookNowBannerSlognDesc
data.value: Professional 1-on-1 personal training.Reserve Now for Free.

data.name: BookNowStep1
data.value: Reserve

data.name: BookNowStep1Desc
data.value: Fill out the form online or give us a call to get in touch.

data.name: BookNowStep2
data.value: Consultant

data.name: BookNowStep2Desc
data.value: Carefully inquire about your health condition and preferences.

data.name: BookNowStep3
data.value: Try it

data.name: BookNowStep3Desc
data.value: Design the right training program for you based on your current condition.

data.name: BookNowStep4
data.value: Customized

data.name: BookNowStep4Desc
data.value: Exquisitely crafted, tailored training content just for you.

data.name: BookNowFormDesc
data.value: To help Beyond Fitness assist you in reaching your goals, this questionnaire allows us to understand your needs.<br class="hidden-md-down" />Our coaches will contact you upon receiving the form to confirm and arrange your trial session.

data.name: BookNowFormColumn1
data.value: Name

data.name: BookNowFormColumn2
data.value: Sex

data.name: BookNowFormColumn3
data.value: Email

data.name: BookNowFormColumn4
data.value: Cell Phone

data.name: BookNowFormColumn5
data.value: What problems would you like Beyond Fitness to help you solve? (You can select multiple options)

data.name: BookNowFormColumn5Option1
data.value: Diet management (requires assistance from a nutritionist)

data.name: BookNowFormColumn5Option2
data.value: Health improvement (physical/mental/discomfort relief)

data.name: BookNowFormColumn5Option3
data.value: Muscle building (Getting in shape)"

data.name: BookNowFormColumn5Option4
data.value: Weight loss (fat reduction)

data.name: BookNowFormColumn5Option5
data.value: Prenatal/Postnatal exercise for expectant/new mothers

data.name: BookNowFormColumn5Option6
data.value: Corrective training and rehabilitation training

data.name: BookNowFormColumn5Option7
data.value: Specialized sports performance enhancement (personal breakthrough)

data.name: BookNowFormColumn5Option8
data.value: Cultivating exercise habits (coach assistance)

data.name: BookNowFormColumn6
data.value: Preferred contact time(s)? (Multiple selections available)

data.name: BookNowFormColumn7
data.value: What is your preferred location for the appointment?

data.name: BookNowFormColumn7Option0
data.value: Please choose

data.name: BookNowFormColumn7Option1
data.value: Nanjing 02-2715-2733（MRT G17-Taipei Arena Exit 1）

data.name: BookNowFormColumn7Option2
data.value: XinyiAnhe 02-2720-0530（MRT R04-Xinyi Anhe Exit 2A）

data.name: BookNowFormColumn7Option3
data.value: Zhongxiao 02-2776-9932（MRT BL15-Zhongxiao Fuxing Exit 3, Exit 14 of the underground mall）

data.name: BookNowFormColumn7Option4
data.value: Dongmen 02-2396-0776（MRT R07-Dongmen Exit 3）

data.name: BookNowFormColumn8
data.value: What questions or other requirements do you have?

data.name: BookNowFormColumn8Desc
data.value: This question is optional. If you don't have any, you can leave it blank and submit. Thank you.

data.name: BookNowFormSendPreDesc
data.value: BEYOND FITNESS team will contact you within 3 days to have a more in-depth understanding of your situation and discuss how to address the issues you raised, ensuring you feel at ease during the trial session. Please make sure to keep an eye on any missed calls or messages.

data.name: BookNowFormAgree
data.value: Yes, I Agree.
